TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A condition that occurs when the body gets used to a medicine so that either more medicine is needed or different medicine is needed.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "tolerancia a un medicamento"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Estado que se presenta cuando el cuerpo se acostumbra a un medicamento, de manera que se necesita administrar una dosis mayor o un medicamento diferente.
